article.class: cf post-5173 post type-post status-publish format-standard sticky hentry category-district category-elementary category-jrsrhs category-news

section.p: Please find below several updates and useful pieces of information while classes are cancelled. This page will be updated as new information becomes available. Find useful state and county contact information, including the COVID-19 hotline Read more »

article.class: cf post-5094 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail sticky hentry category-district category-elementary category-jrsrhs category-news

section.p: The New Lebanon Central School District would like to share some basic information regarding the novel coronavirus (COVID-19). We are closely monitoring the situation and following guidance from the U.S. Centers for Disease Control (CDC), Read more »

article.class: cf post-5209 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-district category-elementary category-jrsrhs category-news

a.title: Food to be available for pickup at WBH 4/21

h2.a: Food to be available for pickup at WBH 4/21

section.p: To our New Lebanon community.. On Tuesday, April 21st at 11:15 am, the New Lebanon Central School District is giving away frozen food to our New Lebanon community. The food was donated by The Regional Read more »

article.class: cf post-5203 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-jrsrhs category-news

a.title: Letter from JSHS Principal regarding Regents Exams

h2.a: Letter from JSHS Principal regarding Regents Exams

section.p: April 8, 2020 Dear Families: As of this week, New York State has cancelled Regents Examinations that had been scheduled for June. As a result of this ruling, students presently enrolled in classes that traditionally Read more »

article.class: cf post-5176 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-district category-elementary category-jrsrhs category-news

a.title: Staying mentally healthy while socially distancing

h2.a: Staying mentally healthy while socially distancing

section.p: We know that the COVID-19 outbreak is disrupting many routines and schedules, so we wanted to share some tips from School Psychologist Patricia White on how to cope with this sudden disruption and the impact Read more »

article.class: cf post-5169 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-district category-elementary category-jrsrhs category-news

section.p: In an effort to decrease contact for both our families and our staff, we will be reducing our delivery days for meals to Tuesdays and Thursdays starting Tuesday, March 24th. Despite decreasing the number of Read more »

article.class: cf post-5167 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-district category-elementary category-jrsrhs category-news

a.title: Meals now available for pickup at WBH

h2.a: Meals now available for pickup at WBH

section.p: It has come to our attention that there are some families in the district who would like to receive the meals we have been delivering, but have not been able to take advantage for various Read more »

article.class: cf post-5159 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-district category-elementary category-jrsrhs category-news

section.p: After our first day of delivering meals, we wanted to share some important information and reminders. Buses are expected to arrive between 9 a.m. and 10 a.m. and will drop off that day’s lunch and Read more »

article.class: cf post-5156 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-district category-elementary category-jrsrhs category-news

a.title: New Lebanon CSD assessing childcare needs in the district

h2.a: New Lebanon CSD assessing childcare needs in the district

section.p: In keeping in line with our goal of supporting our community during the ongoing COVID-19 health crisis, we are looking to assess the childcare needs in our district, particularly those of healthcare workers and first Read more »

article.class: cf post-5147 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-athletics category-district category-elementary category-jrsrhs

a.title: Contacting school psychologists while classes are cancelled

h2.a: Contacting school psychologists while classes are cancelled

section.p: Please read the letter below from the New Lebanon School Psychologists Ms. Gebbie, Ms. Cupp and Ms. White: Dear Families, We hope this letter finds your family both happy and healthy. What a Read more »
